channel.title: SkyLearn Pre-Filter Test Feed #1
channel.description: Mixed signal/noise feed to validate Zapier keyword pre-filter

item.title: Landsec relocates headquarters to new London Bridge office
item.description: Landsec has moved into a 180,000 sq ft headquarters on Tooley Street, consolidating its existing West End offices.

item.title: Stranger Things final season premieres with record-breaking viewership
item.description: Netflix confirms the supernatural drama's concluding episodes have become the platform's most-watched season premiere.

item.title: Brookfield signs major lease with global law firm at City tower
item.description: Brookfield Properties has secured a 15-year lease with a leading international law firm at 100 Bishopsgate.

item.title: Manchester United defeats Arsenal 3-1 in Premier League showdown
item.description: United secured three crucial points at Old Trafford with goals from Rashford, Fernandes, and Garnacho.

item.title: The Mandalorian spin-off series greenlit by Disney+
item.description: Disney announces new Star Wars series following the adventures of Ahsoka Tano across the galaxy.

item.title: Tech giant Google expands UK presence with new Manchester office space
item.description: Google has signed a pre-let agreement for 90,000 sq ft at Circle Square development, planning to relocate 2,000 employees from Birmingham.

item.title: HSBC announces relocation of trading division to Canary Wharf
item.description: The banking giant will move its trading operations from its current location to a newly refurbished tower in Canary Wharf by Q2 2026.

item.title: Liverpool tops Champions League group after Bayern Munich victory
item.description: Salah's hat-trick secures Liverpool's place at the top of the group with two matches remaining.

item.title: Breaking Bad creator announces new crime drama series
item.description: Vince Gilligan reveals details about his upcoming thriller series set to premiere on AMC next year.

item.title: Amazon secures 250,000 sq ft lease at Edinburgh business park
item.description: Amazon has committed to a major office lease at Edinburgh Park, planning to relocate its Scottish operations and hire 1,500 additional staff.

item.title: Real Madrid signs Brazilian wonderkid in record transfer deal
item.description: Los Blancos break their transfer record to secure the 18-year-old midfielder from Palmeiras for â‚¬150 million.

item.title: Game of Thrones prequel series renewed for third season
item.description: HBO confirms House of the Dragon will return for a third season following strong viewership numbers.

item.title: The Crown final episode draws 45 million viewers worldwide
item.description: The concluding chapter of Netflix's royal drama becomes one of the most-watched series finales in streaming history.

item.title: Meta opens new European headquarters in Dublin docklands
item.description: Meta has officially opened its new 450,000 sq ft headquarters in Dublin, consolidating three existing offices into one central location.

item.title: England women's team qualifies for World Cup with final group win
item.description: The Lionesses secured their place in next year's tournament with a convincing 4-0 victory over Sweden.

item.title: Barcelona wins El Clasico in dramatic last-minute goal
item.description: Pedri's 94th-minute strike gives Barcelona a 2-1 victory over Real Madrid in the season's most anticipated match.

item.title: PSG clinches Ligue 1 title with three games remaining
item.description: Paris Saint-Germain mathematically secures another French championship after their 3-0 win over Marseille.

item.title: Barclays consolidates London offices with move to Canary Wharf campus
item.description: Barclays will relocate staff from four separate London offices into a single 300,000 sq ft building at One Churchill Place by mid-2026.

item.title: Succession creator develops new HBO drama about tech industry
item.description: Jesse Armstrong announces his next project will explore the cutthroat world of Silicon Valley startups.

item.title: Peaky Blinders movie confirmed for 2026 theatrical release
item.description: Cillian Murphy confirms he will reprise his role as Tommy Shelby in the highly anticipated feature film continuation.

item.title: Italy defeats France in Nations League semi-final thriller
item.description: The Azzurri prevailed 2-1 after extra time to book their place in the Nations League final against Spain.
